label: 礼日
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
説明文: sames as sanjitsu (the three days): the first, fifteenth, and twenth-eighth of each month, which were celebrated as holidays. Kaempfer seems to use the word in the wider sense of holiday. [三日]
